Having worked through the issues of lockups and other KSC bugs, i am back to give career mode a try.

Once again, I get past Tier 4 (45 pt/techup) of the tech tree and problems started appearing.

This particular bug occurs when trying to examine (right click) on KSC facilities. In certain cases the mouse locked up in other cases nothing happened. Only 2 buildings worked properly. Closing the game and restarting worked.

The other 'minor' problem was a terrain fall through on a quest local, but it was survivable.

PB666,

If you are able to consistently replicate this issue, please check out this thread so that we can better understand how you are doing it. And what you're doing right before hand to trigger it. Reproduction steps and logs, in particular.

Cheers,

~Claw

This reminds me of what I think might be the same thing I saw (a few weeks? ago). It's like the location to right-click on moved or that windows might try to appear off screen, or the windows didn't want to appear over the building (but like at the top of the screen). Closing and restarting also fixed it for me.

Sorry for the vague description.
